entry.title: Baby 6 Month TSHIRT BUNDLES by Rabbit Skins 3 or 4 piece bundles
entry.summary:
Vendor: AB
Type:
Price: 11.45 - 15.30 (8 variants)

The Rabbit Skins 3401 Infant Tee Shirt Series (6m-18m)

 Features:

  • 100% cotton jersey
  • ribbed crew neck
  • taped shoulder-to-shoulder
  • double-needle hemmed sleeves and bottom
  • CPSIA compliant- tracking label inside seam
  • White is sewn with 100% cotton thread
  • Ash is 99% cotton, 1% polyester; Heather is 90% cotton, 10% polyester
  • Inventory for this style may contain tearaway and non-tearaway labels

How to measure:
BODY WIDTH: Lay garment flat. 1" below the armhole flat measure the garment across the chest.
FULL BODY LENGTH: Lay garment flat(face down). Measure from centre back neckline seam straight down to the back bottom hem.
SLEEVE LENGTH: Lay garment flat(face down). Measure from centre back neck to the outer edge of shoulder seam, then along outer edge to sleeve end.

s:variant.title: Royal Blue, Light Blue, Black (one of each)
Navy, Light Blue, Grey (one of each)
Light Blue, Grey, White (one of each)
Light Pink, Grey, White (one of each)

entry.title: CHILDREN'S Buffalo Plaid Raglan Sleeve Shirts - RED Sleeve LIGHT GREY Body
entry.summary:
Vendor: Design Blanks
Type:
Price: 13.80

Children's Buffalo Plaid Sleeve Raglan Shirts. Light grey body with red/black buffalo plaid sleeves.

65% cotton 30% polyester 5% spandex

These fit true to size. Refer to the size chart.

No refunds if you ordered the wrong size.

entry.summary:
Vendor: Design Blanks
Type:
Price: 14.00

This is a limited edition item and when it is gone it is gone!

Super soft, super flattering. Perfect for the holidays!

Long in the body.

Fabric content Green/White Stripe : 95% polyester 5% Spandex

Fabric content Red/White Stripe : 65% cotton 30% polyester 5% spandex

This tee fits true to size or generous fit.

entry.title: CHARCOAL Baby BODYSUIT by Rabbit Skins
entry.summary:
Vendor: AB
Type:
Price: 5.40

The Rabbit Skins 4400 Series.

These are amazing to use with HTV!

  • 100% combed ringspun cotton 1x1 baby rib
  • flatlock seams
  • double-needle ribbed binding on neck, shoulders, sleeves and leg openings
  • reinforced three-snap closure
  • CPSIA compliant- tracking label inside seam
  • White is sewn with 100% cotton thread
  • Heather is 88% cotton, 12% polyester

How to measure:
BODY LENGTH: Lay garment flat (face down). Measure from centre back neckline seam straight down to the bottom of the front hem.
BODY WIDTH: Lay garment flat. 1" below the armhole flat measure the garment across the chest.
FULL BODY LENGTH: Lay garment flat(face down). Measure from centre back neckline seam straight down to the back bottom hem.
SLEEVE LENGTH: Lay garment flat(face down). Measure from centre back neck to the outer edge of shoulder seam, then along outer edge to sleeve end.
